attributes.action: Extend the furlough scheme especially for industries highly affected by COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: I work for a small business that services coffee machines around the whole of UK. COVID-19 has impacted us greatly just like many other small businesses. We appreciate the current government support but it's not enough. The furlough scheme needs to be extended otherwise unemployment rates will increase a lot more.
attributes.background: The government need to follow suit like other countries in Europe and extend the furlough scheme, especially for highly affected industries e.g. Food, Hospitality, coffee machine servicing

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330657
